name: Richie Branson
description: '''Richie Branson''' (born '''Marcus Brown II'''; November 18, 1985) is an American [[music producer]], [[game designer]], and [[nerdcore]] rapper from [[San Antonio, Texas]]. His stage name is derived from that of British entrepreneur [[Richard Branson]]. He has also made various ending themes for the [[Rooster Teeth]] web series ''[[Camp Camp]]'', in which he also voices Jake Stonewall. He is also known as the "'''Otaku King'''" and founder of the group Otaku Gang.
